mstddef.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mstddef.h(7)

NAME

mstddef.h — type definitions

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mstddef.h>

typedef signed ssize_t;

INCLUDES

<sys/types.h>
<stddef.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides ssize_t data type on platforms that do not have it.

July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
